none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 12, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Here you go, freaks - this one started it all. Started what? The HICK TRACY demo back in 2018 was the first release on Deluxe Bias, and it was like those first fat gentle raindrops that fall before the damn clouds open and the basement floods. Buzzsaw US garage hardcore that sounds ripped out of '90s Columbus (if you know what I mean) and the first in a seemingly endless stream of totally ripping and impossible to find releases from a true freak label with a roster full of....well, full of freaks. HICK TRACY
https://deluxebias.bandcamp.com/music

seo.title: Hick Tracy - Demo 2018 - Terminal Escape
